articles.description: Jenna Ortega plays the titular role in “Wednesday.” Christina Ricci, who popularized the character, also has a role in the show about the Addams family.
articles.content:
Jenna Ortega plays Wednesday Addams in the upcoming series that centers on the character.
Shes creepy and shes kooky, mysterious and spooky but shes not Christina Ricci.
Netflix has released its fi… [+1903 chars]
